rComments: A real "rock star" professor. Her lectures were always flashy and theatrical, which is polarizing. I appreciate the effort made, but I found it got to be a bit much as the year went on. That said, she's knowledgeable, clear, and engaging. She went above and beyond teaching the basics of university essay writing, which has helped me in upper years

Prof Cruz is so kind and intelligent, and very clear about her expectations for your learning and writing. However, I felt like she spent a lot of time scoring easy points about how books can be forces of good in the world. Too much lecture time was on how a novel/poem was asking us to change the world, which felt simplistic and cheesy sometimes.

Prof Cruz was lovely and funny; a highlight of my first year! I felt like she actually had a cohesive point to her class rather than just rambling on stage. She's very helpful for developing close reading skills. Very willing to see you and help you personally. Bonus: fun in lecture activities and will occasionally feed the class.
teacherRatingTags: ['Get ready to read', 'Amazing lectures', 'Accessible outside class']

rComments: A good lecturer for first year folks, however upper years could probably see the tautologous arguments she makes for her lectures. Too much reading but again its a first year course to prepare high school kids for university. Someone rated her poorly here because she reads off papers for her lectures, don't be shallow, its about your grade.
teacherRatingTags: ["Skip class? You won't pass.", 'Tough grader', 'Gives good feedback']

rComments: Professor Cruz is brilliant and insightful. She is such a nice person and accommodating professor, willing to give extensions and work with you through any problems. Her lectures were amazing, her reading lists were engaging, and she is really available in office hours to help you out.   One of the best professors I have ever had.

Professor Cruz is genuinely the most amazing professor; she's cute, funny, theatrical at times with her lectures, interactive, and just generally fun. She has a weekly prize every lecture, and sometimes even gives out food. The questions she gives to the floor are helpful in developing close reading skills.  Love Prof. Cruz.
Incredible professor, one of the best I've had at this university.

Prof Cruz is an amazing individual; not a lecturer. She has great qualities: she's funny, laid back, and her lectures are fun and engaging. However, her style of teaching is lackluster. She reads the entire lecture off handouts! Also, she reads with overexaggeration.  I understand that she is a fairly new professor but I still hold my opinion.
Prof. Cruz is an incredible lecturer, and easily my favourite prof.
My favourite prof that I've had!

Prof Cruz's lectures were hilarious and intriguing. She was very clear on the criteria  for the essays and there was a lot of feedback that allowed me to improved with each paper. Her class really changed the way I wrote my essays. Reading the books is a must! She does talk fast during her lectures which makes it hard to keep up with note taking.

THE GREATEST. She's like the Muhammed Ali of professors. Incredible lectures, so smart. She's wonderfully friendly and always ends lectures with a mic drop. I cannot recommend her enough. Seriously, she's amazing. My favorite prof I've ever had. SO SO GOOD!!!

Honestly, I read 2 out of like 10 books on the syllabus and finished with an 80. She pretty much lays everything out for you in lecture so you can totally get away with like, looking on spark notes the night before the exam. Also, she literally gave us exactly what would be on the exam, and if you had a student note pool, it's a cake walk. Take it.

Very excellent professor that engages with her students. The material was interesting and lectures were hilarious and easy to follow. She proved  support and had very clear instructions when it came to any essay or assignment which allowed me to siginificantly improve. This courses really helped me strengthen my writing skills.

The best professor I have had at UofT thus far. Passionate, funny and puts a tremendous amount of effort into making lectures fun and engaging. Would totally take another class with her as a lecture. Material is very interesting too.

Cruz is the kind of prof that inspires you by her passion. She is hilarious and cutting edge, an overall brilliant professor. Her lectures are well thought out and easy to follow if you pay attention, and really entertaining, encouraging students to actually think. She has memorized like  half the students names in a huge lecture hall. Take ENG140

Professor Cruz is such is just brilliant! I really love how she's so passionate about  this course and wants all her students to do well. She's really approachable and she clarifies anything people have doubts on. She's humourous and always keeps her lectures really entertaining! She ends off her lectures with something that gets us thinking!

Prof Cruz is amazing. Her lectures are insightful, hilarious, & super engaging. You can tell she puts a lot effort into her lectures to make them as enjoyable as possible for us. Also, she genuinely cares about getting to know us & helping us improve. I honestly cannot think of a single thing I would change about her class. Would highly recommend!

Though English was my strongest subject in high school, this class essentially made me rethink my entire way of writing essays (in a good way). Professor Cruz's lectures are incredibly entertaining. Marking is connected to your improvements, and if you take feedback and go to office hours you should do progressively better throughout the course.

Her lectures are thoroughly interesting and immersive, but guest speakers make it less entertaining. LOTS of readings and papers are marked quite hard (class average 70). Office hours are open to all and she gives out little prizes at the beginning of lecture. The class is 90% female and / or English majors. Hard work is rewarded here!

I like this course because I love sitting in her lectures. She speaks like an essay. Yes, you have to work hard on papers, but she encourages students to come to her office hours. If you dedicate yourself, you'll see your marks improve.
Always has great lectures, makes them very interactive!

She is a hero among professors. She is an inspiring, knowledgeable, hilarious prof who somehow remembers a many students name's considering its a 400+ class. She gives prizes and uses media clips to make it interesting. Every lecture is like the best TED talk you've ever seen, not to mention all of the books are fantastic and thoughtful.
Her presenting style,wit and humor really engages the class and her enthusiasm really shone through. Really approachable outside of class too. Easily my favourite prof for first year!

This class was my favorite of the year and the only one I would consistently attend and enjoy! Seriously, if you're only going to take one english course you're whole uni career make sure it's this one and if you're into modern literature, you will love this course!

While there are a lot of books and keeping up is tough, Prof. Cruz is a great person and presenter who loves to be dramatic (she put on a musical performance in the last lecture), and cares deeply for her students. Despite the fact that we were a 400+ class she managed to remember a lot of people's names and was very enthusiastic about the course.

Eccentric to say the least, but definitely engaging.  Very personal, and remembered plenty of students' names if they came to office hours or asked questions in lecture.  Gave out a kinder egg every lecture for a correct answer.  Played telephone with 600 people and encouraged us to all sing Journey songs together. Very entertaining lecture.

Prof Cruz is AH-MAZING. She is so engaging, so funny, so clear, and just overall an amazing prof. I look forward to her lectures; she always seems to make them so profound and interesting. She interacts with students all the time, and she is so incredibly helpful. I absolutely love her and I plan on trying my hardest to have another class with her!

Never have I ever had someone so eloquent, articulate, passionate, helpful or inspirational Professor like Professor Cruz! Lectures are always something you look forward to every day. Make sure you do the readings so you can follow along in class!
Such a fantastic, eloquent, and caring professor. DO NOT miss the chance to take a class with her! The reading list was amazing and Prof. Cruz treats her students as academic equals.
Wonderful prof! Her enthusiasm is so infectious, and she really helps her students to succeed. Reading list was great, and class discussions were always informative. Do take her courses if you can!
Amazing professor. She wants everybody to succeed, marks all your papers thoroughly, and she is such a joy as a teacher.
I adore Prof. Cruz. She's so obviously into what she's teaching, her heart is into her every class, and she's just brilliant. Would take another class of hers again, for sure.
